tokens.text: defines client-side biome visuals including water and fog colors

title: Biomes Client
description: The biomes_client.json file defines client-side visual properties for biomes, including water colors, fog colors, and transparency settings.

fields.title: Biomes
fields.description: A collection of biome visual definitions. Keys are biome identifiers (e.g., 'minecraft:plains') or 'default' for fallback settings.

fields.title: Water Surface Color
fields.description: The color of water surfaces in this biome. Specified as a hex color string (e.g., '#44AFF5').

fields.title: Water Surface Transparency
fields.description: The transparency of water surfaces. 0.0 is fully transparent, 1.0 is fully opaque.

fields.title: Water Fog Color
fields.description: The color of fog when underwater in this biome. Specified as a hex color string.

fields.title: Water Fog Distance
fields.description: The distance at which underwater fog becomes fully opaque.

fields.title: Fog Color
fields.description: The color of atmospheric fog in this biome. Specified as a hex color string.

note: The 'default' entry provides fallback values for any biome not explicitly defined. All color values use hex format with '#' prefix.
